verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Him. Praise Him Praise Him with your song. Praise Him. Praise Him Praise Him all day long.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For the Lord is worthy, Worthy to receive our praise. For the Lord is worthy, Worthy to receive our praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Him. Praise Him, Praise Him with your heart. Praise Him. Praise Him Praise Him all day long.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Him. Praise Him. Praise Him with your life. Praise Him. Praise Him. Lift His name up high.{/lang-eng}
